system.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted by a Physical- or Special-Category Attack.

Effect: The user can freely move up to half of the Movement Score of their choice towards the target and then attacks with this Attack. If the target gains @Affliction[fainted] due to damage from this Attack, the triggering attack fails.
